website_summaries.verdict: With clean lines and a simple design, this headboard looks just like competitors seen at high-end stores.
pros: Really dresses up the bed and room
Made from solid wood poles and particle board
cons: Included hardware may not fit your frame

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: After looking at fabric headboards in the price range of $300-$500 at local furniture shops and being disappointed, I decided to try Amazon. So glad I did because I am in love with my purchase! This headboard is of the same if not better quality as the headboards we saw in stores. Assembly was easy and the different height options were a big plus. Overall excellent headboard!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality for the price! Instructions were in clear English, the fabric does not feel cheap and was simple. The legs have many notches so you can easily choose what height you want the headboard set at. To Assemble
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Mounted to wall
customer_reviews.text: Although this headboard was not sold with an option for wall mounting, I decided to do so using a long French cleat (which I bought at the Home Depot, but you can find them on this site as well) and drywall anchors and screws. This was the best option for me since I have a wood platform bed. Incidentally, the fabric color is a true ivory/beige. I was a little hesitant about ordering it since it has a pinkish tinge on my monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Free bird

customer_reviews.title: Love the headboard
customer_reviews.text: Love the headboard. The ivory does show fingerprints so I'll have to figure out how to wash those off but it came clean and on time. Very easy to build. This works with the zinus smartbase 14" if you get the bracket attachments from zinus as well, it was an easy installation even for just one person. Like others have mentioned, it's something that look nice on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Renee M

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Crazy easy to put together and attach to my collapsable bed frame. I was able to mount the two pieces together by myself. Comes with a huge bag of screws, washers, nuts, and even little tools like a mini wrench and screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: itsrachelnoel

customer_reviews.title: Even better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great!!! The fabric is really good quality, with a linen texture, and the antique brass nailhead trim is nicely applied. Nailheads are slightly larger than ones I have seen on antique upholstered furniture, so the headboard feels clean and modern. We did not use the adjustable wooden upright supports because we knew we would be mounting the headboard to the wall "hotel style," using a French cleat/bracket (also purchased on Amazon) and it worked out beautifully! Supports are sturdy, seem to be well constructed, with a dark wooden finish; wall mounting was just personal preference. I don't write very many reviews, but chose to in this case because I am so pleased with the quality of this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: dandeliongirl

customer_reviews.title: Looks really nice.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter's room at college. She doesn't have a standard bed there, rather she has a premium inflatable mattress that goes on a stand, but she wanted it to look like a 'real bed.' So we just assembled it, put some soft pads on the back of it leaned it up against the wall and then pushed the stand up against it. It looks super in there and if she gets and actual boxspring and frame we'll still be able to use it. The gray color is right on with how it looks on the screen and it's really nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Litke

customer_reviews.title: really easy to attach
customer_reviews.text: Got it delivered on time.really easy to attach. Just what I expected. Husband couldn't believe that price. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ewelina Malec

customer_reviews.title: Yes you can afford a nice headboard! Here it is!!
customer_reviews.text: Posted by Wayne's daughter: I thought the wall was going to be my new headboard until I found this. A headboard I could actually afford! It's beautiful, warm and cozy.Tweedy fabric with nice brass buttons along the border. I love it! The headboard came with good quality hardware to attach the posts and mount it on the bed frame. It's easy to put together and attach. Helpful hint- I glued a small 1" piece of memory foam near the top middle back of the headboard to keep it away from the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne P

customer_reviews.title: Really Updates a Room For Cheap Price
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my guest bedroom and honestly it looks great. I was worried that it would look cheap but I am not disappointed at all. It takes a bed and makes it look special. The lighter colors can get dirty easy so be careful but that said it is perfect for what we wanted. It replaced a crappy old wood headboard we used to have in that room.
customer_reviews.author: JLinhart

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase on Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great headboard in such a good deal. My bed frame is a full size but it is only 53 inch in width, so I need to adjust the screws. It is so easy to set it up with one person and they provide the required tools which is the best thing, especially for a non-handy person like me :). I bought the gray color and the color is true to what is shown on amazon website.
customer_reviews.author: MKSTL

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but looks expensive!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say for the price this headboard is PERFECT!!!! Easy to assemble had all of the hardware and looks perfect. I purchased the queen in IVORY and coupled with the 18" SmartBase foundation from Zinus the two work simply perfect! It's not a full headboard from floor to top but flanked with a couple 22" modern night stands and lamps the look is superb for the cost!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jo-el

customer_reviews.title: It's a bit on the thin side but the fabric and nailheads look SO much better than the price tag suggests
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for an inexpensive, upholstered headboard, do yourself a favor and buy this one. It's a bit on the thin side but the fabric and nailheads look SO much better than the price tag suggests. It is so easy to adjust - I put it together alone (30 something female) and tried 3 different heights before I settled on one. Could not be happier. Mine arrived with all hardware and did not have any defects, unlike some of the other reviews have indicated.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S

customer_reviews.title: Dont make your own, unless your crafty.
customer_reviews.text: Was considering making my own headboard (crazy thought), after countless YouTube videos and a walk through the craft store looking at fabrics and Lowes - I decided this was a far more effective route!!! I'm sure my homemade headboard wouldn't have looked this good - plus the labor, transport and proper assembly. Everything arrived in perfect condition. It's height adjustable (depending where you use the fasteners). I thing it looks great and am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Cute and simple, the price made it even sweeter
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to give my bed some flair until I find "the" bed frame I'm looking for; this was such a good deal for what it is. The railheads are not perfectly straight in one spot, but if you're looking for perfection, spend more money. I'm very happy and the linen look is pretty. I used it with the Zinus 14 inch SmartBase Mattress Foundation, using the brackets that they sell as well. I did use the bolts provided with the headboard, the bracket comes with wing nuts which aren't as strong.
customer_reviews.author: Mulva

customer_reviews.title: Such a great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Such a great deal for the price! The headboard feels and looks like it's good quality. The nail detail is especially beautiful and really makes this piece standout! My only complaint would be that all the screws are tightened but it still is a little wobbly on the bed (maybe because of the height?) It was very easy to assemble and only took a few minutes! Overall, it's a great great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much bought another one!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this again for my niece after having bought one for my 4 year old's bed as well. The look is just perfect, the quality is good especially given this is the lowest price available for this look and style of headboard. It's neutral enough without being a typical white for little girls or a dowdy brown color. Installation required only myself and took a total of 15 minutes including the time it took to cart this upstairs and open the box. Very simple and basic installation with standard bed frames.
customer_reviews.author: ClaudiaTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to assmble
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly - 4 screws to attach the rails to the headboard.. This headboard comes with 4 bolts for attaching to a bed frame. Unfortunately my bed frame didn't have holes large enough to accommodate the bolts, but I found some slightly smaller ones that did the trick. It's also light enough for one person to manage.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Looks good for the price! Works with wire bed frame!
customer_reviews.text: The cloth looks and feels like linen. It was incredibly easy to install. I have a wire frame so can't fix it to the edge but it leans perfectly straight on the wall when I push in the wire bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: Jaytee

customer_reviews.title: Needs better packing due to weight and size.
customer_reviews.text: Headboard arrived damaged -- looks as if the headboard was dragged during delivery. This headboard (queen) needs better packing since I suspect that due to its size and weight someone deemed it too heavy to handle. There should be better packing at least around the corners. I would reorder but suspect it will happen again. Too bad. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: J. kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Product is just as picture depicts. Nice quality for the money. Nail head trim was all in order neatly on the edge. Color is a nice light grey. Simple to assemble although we opted not to put the legs on. We simply placed the headboard in front of the metal bed frame of my daughter's dorm room bed. It fits perfectly and gives her support to lean on and nice finishing touch to her bed.
customer_reviews.author: c.not

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL HEADBOARD UNFORTUNATELY HAD TO RETURN
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a college dorm. We tried every which way to attach the headboard to the existing college bed frame and were unable to do so. The "wood Legs" for the new headboard are just not thick and sturdy enough to hold the weight of the hugh oak college dorm bed. Unfortunately, we are returning. We think it would work well for a regular metal bed frame. Additionally, it was very clean when it arrived and I did not see any "bed bugs" which I think were mentioned in a few 2016 reviews.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. The shipping was faster than expected and the headboard is beautiful. It can be set up at different heights to accomadate the height of your bed. Also, there are extra parts included for assembly to a bedframe if you need those screws and allen wrenches. Would buy again if I had more than one bed, but until then I will recommend to family and friends! Also, you are able to assemble this with ease to a metal bedframe.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit Amazon bed frame
customer_reviews.text: The headboard itself is nice and looks sturdy. My only issue is the Amazon frame I have for the bed is too small for this headboard. So now I have to figure out how to safely attach the headboard to the wall so it stops making noise (from smacking the wall) every time my daughter moves in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Heather W.

customer_reviews.title: Headboard bolts are too big to fit in slots of bed frame.
customer_reviews.text: Headboard looks nice. The bolts that come with this do not fit the Zinus bed frame that is paired with it on the Amazon site so plan on having to buy bolts to be able to set it up. Also, I purchased risers to have the bed sit up higher since the frame was so low to the ground. The headboard doesn’t accommodate changing the height so you need 8 risers in total to elevate the bed, 6 for the frame and 2 for the headboard.
customer_reviews.author: LAS

customer_reviews.title: Modway Upholstered Linen Headboard
customer_reviews.text: The headboard more than met my expectations. I had ordered the headboard expecting to recover it but that was unnecessary as the fabric is of good quality. At the price point, I was pleased to find that the back had a proper covering. The headboard was wrapped so that the fabric did not become soiled while unpacking or assembling. Everything needed for assembly, including the bolts, washers, and allen wrenches, was packed separately in heavy plastic sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn P.

customer_reviews.title: Looks BEAUTIFUL and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Love this headboard! It is beautiful and easy to install and attach to the wall or your bed frame. It looks like it cost at least three times the price, and the "nailheads" are on a strip rather than being individual so they should stay attached much better, and still look fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Elissa

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS headboard!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for daughter’s dorm to dress up bed. Haven’t put it up yet but it’s very well made, arrived well packaged. Has a very modern, elegant look! UPDATE: Thus is very elegant and dressed up my daughter’s plain, dorm bed. Easy set up, dorm bed didn’t have holes to add headboard so we used zip ties to secure it to the bed frame. Turned out BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.author: Nise

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, screws provided may/may not fit frame
customer_reviews.text: These looked pretty much like they are pictured. I ordered two. They were super easy to put together and took me maybe 5 to 10 minutes per headboard. Only issue I had was that the screws provided did not fit the standard sized metal frame I had so I wasn’t able to secure them. For the price, however, I can’t really complain.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I have a standard size queen box spring and mattress (about 10in thick) I decided not to screw this into my wall so instead my b
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this without the bed frame. I have a standard size queen box spring and mattress (about 10in thick) I decided not to screw this into my wall so instead my box spring and mattress are holding it up and its doing a great job. Even when we have adult time it doesn't bag loudly. But I do not have a baseboard so I think that's why. The color was as it was pictures and came without damages.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it!!! So easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS PERFECT!!! And for the amount I paid for it. I put it together and attached to the bed frame in 20 minutes and I am not handy. At all. It took me longer to get it out of the box and to check the nuts and bolts that came with it. I only paid $58 (there were discounts) and I got it in 2 days. I highly recommend for guest bedrooms. Love love love this!
customer_reviews.author: Bebe031403

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeously simple
customer_reviews.text: I am creating a bedroom oasis and decided a linen headboard was needed. I did not anticipate how expensive this would be. I was about to build one myself using my old headboard after watching a YouTube video when I found this on ole Trusty (my code name for Amazon). I hemmed and hawed then ordered it. As usual, it worked perfectly. The khaki color is a bit darker than I anticipated but is light enough to work with. It looks very classy with clean lines and the finish is very sophisticated. This was a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: CafeMamiTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Needs more holes on the posts
customer_reviews.text: This was easy enough to put together on my own however it isn’t sturdy at all. My bed is freestanding and not against the wall, and the headboard isn’t sturdy to sit up against. If it had more holes in the posts to be able to attach it in more places To my bed frame then it would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Great looking headboard for a steal price
customer_reviews.text: I love the headboard. It was a very reasonable price compared to others I've seen. It bolted to the bed very quickly and came with all hardware needed. It is around 1 inch wider on each side of my king size mattress and looks great. Shipping time was also reasonable for it being a large box item. Completely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What was supposed to be gray came looking green.
customer_reviews.text: My main concern and dislike with this product was the appearance the headboard portrayed. I was expecting a light gray color, but instead I received what looked almost greenish. I could describe the color to look almost close to moldy cheese. Not gray at all. I wish I had taken a picture to show the contrast of what was displayed and what I got but I returned the item immediately. The studs on the headboard looked close to old rusty nickels than a true silver appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Good looking headboard!
customer_reviews.text: For the money you won’t find a better looking head board. Looks wonderful in our guest room now that our last child that was living at home moved out. It was easy to install and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: Royal Room
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful headboard. After going to different furniture stores this product is by far the best. It was easy to assemble. The nailhead feature gave my guest bed a royal look on a budget.I am so satisfied and happy I purchased it. You will never get a better headboard for such an affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: Dee El

customer_reviews.title: Very Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Feels and looks cheap. Missing hardware made it difficult to assemble, even after a trip to the hardware store. I threw this out after a few weeks because it was depressing me.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Snazy Headboad-Perfect Addition
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love this headboard. It's exactly what I was looking for. Nothing to heavy or hard to deal with. Installed this beauty to my King size bed frame in minutes. Changed the feel an look of my bedroom instantly. I may order another one for my guest bedroom, but in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: P. Paiva

customer_reviews.title: A total steal!
customer_reviews.text: My husband spent more time using the legs for an imaginary guitar than putting this together. Super easy! Sturdy and the vanilla colored linen like fabric is really pretty. We are starting to assemble my son's bedroom and the headboard is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: L. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: I installed it in no time and it looks absolutely beautiful. It's very well made and I'm so happy ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a headboard for my guest room for some time and found this. I couldn't believe how cheap it was and took a chance on it. I installed it in no time and it looks absolutely beautiful. It's very well made and I'm so happy I took a chance!
customer_reviews.author: Kiana CTop Contributor: Aquascaping

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive elegance
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Looks high quality. Packaging superior. Arrived perfect. Assembly so simple that 72 yr old female completely installed a full size headboard alone in half an hour!
customer_reviews.author: noreen

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality - Looks Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cheap. The metal studs are interconnected, which gives it a very cheap look. This was not apparent from the pictures. May add my own studs since the packaging was too damaged to reuse to send back. Extremely disappointed at the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Neanerneaner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deal! Great looking headboard!
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous headboard! Looks great in my guest room! It was not dirty or broken. Packaging was just enough for headboard. It did not arrive damaged nor dirty. The studs on the headboard I received were evenly distributed. You can look closely at the pictures I provided. This really is a steal for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lenard

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!! Incredible price & good quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks great!! Incredible price & good quality, really happy with how it came out..I ordered two twin size headboards in grey for our two guestrooms and the design is simple and classy. We nailed them to a high riser and it really gave the rooms a complete finished look. Check out the pics. (all hardware was included in the box)
customer_reviews.author: Rosalyne

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this headboard
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this headboard. It has more than exceeded my expectations! It fits my full size bed perfectly and has made it much my comfortable than leaning back on pillows against the wall. A lot of bang for your buck, looks elegant, and well, it's just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Gray blue linen, bronze nail heads, king size
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a day early, looks perfect. Light blue gray color but i do have light blue walls and curtains so that may reflect a bit. The nail heads look perfect and are bronze, sometimes they protrude a little but push right back in. Hooked up to our serta adjustable base. We might lower it a little because our pillows do slide down in to the choate thats open. We did not snitch gaurd, a reviewer warned against it. So far, 2 months of use, looks great!
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible, not great
customer_reviews.text: Pretty straight forward to install onto a bed frame. The legs are made of particle board or some sort of MDF board. Definitely is not sturdy enough to support even a toddler leaning on it, even when up against a wall. It wobbles and is not very sturdy. For the price, I can’t complain too much. It would be good if you’re using it in a guest bedroom or something like that.
customer_reviews.author: David Campbell

customer_reviews.title: You can't make it any cheaper, excellent value! Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Had this assembled in 5 minutes! It said it was going to have silver tone nail trim (which I was going to have to paint to match my decor) but it showed up with gun metal grey. Which was perfect!!! I ordered the Ivory. Love it. Excellent value for the price. I couldn't have made it cheaper, I do that!
customer_reviews.author: Shawny B

customer_reviews.title: Great headboard at a steal!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our daughter and her "upgrade" to a full-size bed! Hers is the cream/ivory color with dark brass nailhead. The nails are mostly straight and the padding is firm. She loves it. I worry it will dirty quickly and so I have applied ScotchGuard - hoping that will help keep it clean! Headboard shipped quickly and was free of defects. For the price, I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: JennN.

customer_reviews.title: Modway Region Upholstered Linen Headboard Twin
customer_reviews.text: Modway Region Upholstered Linen Headboard Twin. My daughter love her new head boar, it looks very elegant, price was great! really a great product to buy. Happy with this head board, delivered in time in perfect conditions. Great !
customer_reviews.author: J Med

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for my vacation home after spending hours searching on the internet for just the right one at a fair price. So glad I decided on these! They arrived in a timely manner and in good shape. The "legs" were easy to attach and attaching to the bedframe was easy, too. Friends were over and helped me. They fell in love with them as well. They give my two guestrooms that added touch and they look great!
customer_reviews.author: MauiMar

customer_reviews.title: The other was perfect. The headboard looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these. One of the boxes was chewed up in transit. The other was perfect. The headboard looks awesome. Liked it so much that I ordered two more for guest rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.text: Looks great!! Love the material, high quality for the price. My mom actually ended up buying after seeing mine
customer_reviews.author: NB123

customer_reviews.title: Really nice looking headboard for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking headboard for the price. I ordered two, both arrived in good condition. They were easy to attach to two different bedframes, one of which was purchased on Amazon. The grey color goes well with the sky blue I painted the room. The nail head trim gives a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: UAstudentn

customer_reviews.title: This headboard looks great and was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This headboard looks great and was easy to assemble. My only complaint is that the bolts attaching it to the frame were way too think to go through my standard sized frame holds. Had to emprovise.
customer_reviews.author: Everett's Mom

customer_reviews.title: great quality /easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: love love love these headboards,we were looking for nice looking headboards to put in our guestroom for n affordable price,got these on sale and cant be happier with my purchase, we are constantly getting compliments on the design,look,and quality. I am in no way considered handy but had them up and running in under 20 min.! it comes with all tools needed,would buy again!!!
customer_reviews.author: laya k.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely impressed, beautiful headboard!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely impressed with the quality of this headboard and only paid a fraction of the cost compared to the big box store I was originally going to purchase from. Put together with my full-size bed frame and the hardware provided in less than 15 min. I purchased the Ivory color and would highly recommend this item in a heartbeat :) Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: JuneBride2009

customer_reviews.title: it was the best deal that I ever found
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it was the best deal that I ever found. I had only bed without a headboard about a year and then finally decided to get a headboard. After comparing market prices, I reached the conclusion that this would be the best buy. What a difference it made! Not only did it make my bed look posh but also I feel more secure!
customer_reviews.author: Suenyc

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality and great price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and great price! Wish it was easier to connect to non standard bed frames though. I just have mine pinned between the wall and the mattress because I have a plain, lifted European style bedframe.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Looks great esp considering the price
customer_reviews.text: Looks great esp considering the price. No issues setting it up. I wouldn't lean up against it unless it was right up against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: elmaestro

customer_reviews.title: Sharp look
customer_reviews.text: I really like these headboards. They look great & our bed delivery guys said they were easy to install. They're sharp looking and just the right size. The price was amazing. Bought these 6 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: kathy k

customer_reviews.title: High end look without the high price tag.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great/high end without the high price tag and very easy to install, I'm no handy Andy but I had this attached and done within minutes; I love it.
customer_reviews.author: tad

customer_reviews.title: It’s too large for my bed and my zinus bedframe
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to see such fine quality product As I was trying to piece it together with my bedframe Then I realized it’s too wide My zinus bedframe and my bed is about 52inchs And the head board is about 60 inches close to a queen sized bed Sadly I had to return this thing Now I had to keep on looking for a headboard
customer_reviews.author: Anna M.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! It was perfect for my daughter. Looks great and fits perfect for full size bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The style and quality was great for the price. Assembly is easy, however it was slightly too large for my standard metal bed frame. Sadly had to return since it didn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Xiao Hafez

customer_reviews.title: This headboard looks great! It is a slight bit wider (very slight) ...
customer_reviews.text: This headboard looks great ! It is a slight bit wider (very slight) that the full size bed. It looks way more expensive than it is. My Husband had to make some adjustments because it didnt match up to the holes in the metal bed frame. But it now looks wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Angelo D.

customer_reviews.title: Looks expensive~~
customer_reviews.text: Ok,I haven't attached them to my beds yet,but they look great!! For the money you can't beat them!! Arrived a day earlier than expected .....very thankful!! UPDATE: I attached them to the beds....easy-peasy!! The look expensive and incredible!!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Curd

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful headboard but my bed was really low to the floor to make an impact so i bought bed risers. I also had to tuck a blanket in between the top of the bed and bottom of the headboard so it doesn't hit the wall every time i move the bed.
customer_reviews.author: SJJ

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty.
customer_reviews.text: Color is darker than pic. Has a blue undertone. Not a warm gray. They will work for great for the room.
customer_reviews.author: Mamacita124

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!!!:)
customer_reviews.text: I just received my headboard. I love it. I ordered it Cafe color, is exactly the color I was looking for, looks darker than the one in the picture, is more like a linen/burlap color. Looks fancy and is well made. Easy to put together, and I like that it can be adjusted to few heights. Price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Happy SAHM of twin girls

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Went together easily. You might need shorter screws if they get too close to the wall when you attach to the bed frame but that's an easy pick up at the hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought two from Amazon "USED, LIKE NEW". Perfect condition, nice quality. Easy to attach to bed frame, hardware included. Color true to picture. Only disappointed at rivets, they are a strip, rather than individual rivets.
customer_reviews.author: Sixty Six

customer_reviews.title: Love the headboard - did not like that there were ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the headboard - did not like that there were a few spots on it. Not a big enough deal to return. Too big of a hassle. I did get the Ivory, so if you're ordering a darker color I imagine this would not be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Robin G

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love my new headboard. Amazing quality for the price! It was easy to assemble to the bed frame I already owned and makes my bed look more put together. The materials are high quality and just as nice as the $300 beds you could get in other stores.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It look maybe 15 minutes to put this bed together, and we really enjoy it. It looks just like the picture and feels alot more expensive than what it costs. Yes, the grommets are connected and not individual, but you can't tell really. Can't wait to finish decorating
customer_reviews.author: Gg

customer_reviews.title: Nailheads not completely lined up...
customer_reviews.text: As noted- the nailhead did not completely line up. It was in an area that is not entirely visible so I kept it. However, had it been in a visible spot- attempts to fix it would have been difficult given the way it's lined-up. Otherwise- I love this headboard.
customer_reviews.author: Soraya D.

customer_reviews.title: The outer package arrived torn but the headboard was in perfect condition. It is possible to adjust the height ...
customer_reviews.text: This headboard is gorgeous. The outer package arrived torn but the headboard was in perfect condition. It is possible to adjust the height if you attach it to the headboard. I just have it against the wall with the bed against it and that works well too.
customer_reviews.author: Lazy cook

customer_reviews.title: Headboard for my new Queen size bed.
customer_reviews.text: I got this when I moved to a queen bed and I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: CN1021

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, simple and great quality. This headboard is great but for the price. It feels and looks expensive and al the hardware and instructions made for easy installation.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Thin
customer_reviews.text: Looks like photo and reviews however it is very thin. Wish it was taller and thicker . Quality is lacking (feels cheaply made) but look wise it’s as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful headboard. Excellent quality especially for the price!! Easy to assemble as well!
customer_reviews.author: q17

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our guest room and it is just perfect. It is a beautiful headboard that was easy to install and super sturdy. Love love love it
customer_reviews.author: heather petty

customer_reviews.title: Simple and perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Easy to install, looks GREAT and the value is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: GREAT buy !
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The installation materials and directions were very simple. The product is beautifully made and the looks amazing in my bedroom. Great buy for the cost! No dents in fabric or materials as previously stated in some of the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Elegant, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great deal, well-made, grey is working very well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Size is off on headboard
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. The light grey looks more like a blue denim so that is something to consider. I have an adjustable bed frame that can be a queen or a full and both settings did not fit this headboard. I will have to use wood screws to attach the frame now.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: and very sturdy. Not overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of them for my daughters. They are very elegant looking, and very sturdy. Not overpriced, if anything i would honestly say they are underpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Rocio Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful in person too bad it was ripped
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two twin gray headboards and they look so good in person. I was bummed that one headboard had a tear in the back. They were easy to attach bed frame. They look expensive and really complete my daughters bedrooms.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful headboard and came exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful headboard and came exactly as described! The only issue was that the bolts that came with it to attach the legs to a bed frame were too large for my frame but a trip to Home Depot solved that issue! Great buy for my guest room!
customer_reviews.author: Christen Dowling

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Although the headboard it’s self is lovely I am very dissatisfied with the product. The box was open upon arrival and did not come with any instructions or screws to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Webb

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: I mean I like it but it’s two inches too long on either side. King size bed, king size headboard
customer_reviews.author: WillE

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for over a year now in my spare bedroom that is used often without any issues. Easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality for the price, and it looks great but it's not very sturdy so I would not suggest leaning your back against it to watch TV or read.. otherwise it's lovely!
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: I love how it looks
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this headboard! It looks so expensive but really wasn't! So rich and classy, I love how it looks. Great quality and easy to set up. Adds warmth and texture to my bedroom, I do love it!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Yardley

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, very nice headboard for the money!! Would recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy headboard.
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful head board. More on the dusty blue side that grey, but for the price you I got my monies worth. I think it was made for a platform bed though because of the type of bolts that came with it. Any way no complaints, the head board is lovely.
customer_reviews.author: louise

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This item does what it's supposed to do. Very solid and easy to install. The adjustable height is a nice feature. My only complaint is that the screws (metric) included in the packaging did not fit my cheap frame, and I had to go out an buy a different size. Not an expensive fix, and for the money I'm saving by not buying this in a retail store, very worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard D. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally buy things like this online. I was worried about the look and quality of it but was pleasantly surprised. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a simple, but sleek headboard.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P

customer_reviews.title: If I could give this product 10 stars I would, fantastic!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beyond my expectations of a wonderful product! Made of simply elegant, quality materials, exactly as pictured and very easy to put together with supplied hardware and accurate instructions. I could not be happier with this purchase!!! Will be ordering additional headboards for other rooms in my home.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia p

product_meta.title: Modway Region Linen Fabric Upholstered Queen Headboard in Ivory with Nailhead Trim
product_meta.description: Color:Ivory| Size:QueenEnhance your bed of choice with a spaciously designed Modway Region Linen Fabric Upholstered Queen Headboard. Region Queen Headboard captures the expansive moments of restful nights with an elegance that doesn’t detract from the simplicity of the design. Made of particleboard with solid wood poles and fine linen fabric upholstery, and stylish nailhead trim, rejoice with a contemporary design that admirably complements your contemporary décor and most queen beds.
feature_bullets: SLEEK DESIGN - Linear edges and nailhead trim give this queen size headboard a sleek, elegant look. Elevating any room, this fabric headboard complements bedroom décor with a balanced look
UPHOLSTERED HEADBOARD - Boasting a pleasant hue, this headboard for queen bed frames is upholstered in fine linen fabric that lends just the right amount of texture to the overall look
STURDY CONSTRUCTION - Expertly constructed with a durable blend of solid wood poles and particle board, the queen size upholstered headboard is built to stand the test of time
CONTEMPORARY STYLE - Modern style meets contemporary fashion in this queen headboard. A welcome update to a master bedroom or guest suite, this linen headboard awakens tranquility
ADJUSTABLE HEIGHT HEADBOARD - This upholstered queen fabric headboard has six height adjustable mounting positions from 40” - 47.5”, and attaches to most queen bed frames

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars739 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
